verses.verse: בַּיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> In those days הָהֵ֔ם <WH1992> those חָלָ֥ה <WH2470> sick חִזְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH2396> was Hezekiah לָמ֑וּת <WH4191> unto death וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> came אֵ֠לָיו <WH413> and יְשַׁעְיָ֨הוּ <WH3470> Isaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אָמ֜וֹץ <WH531> of Amoz הַנָּבִ֗יא <WH5030> And the prophet וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> to him and said אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> to him כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> unto him Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD צַ֣ו <WH6680> in order לְבֵיתֶ֔ךָ <WH1004> Set thine house כִּ֛י <WH3588> for מֵ֥ת <WH4191> for thou shalt die אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and not תִֽחְיֶֽה׃ <WH2421> and not live

וַיַּסֵּ֥ב <WH5437> Then he turned אֶת־ <WH853> פָּנָ֖יו <WH6440> his face אֶל־ <WH413> to הַקִּ֑יר <WH7023> to the wall וַיִּ֨תְפַּלֵּ֔ל <WH6419> and prayed אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

אָנָּ֣ה <WH577> I beseech יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> thee O LORD זְכָר־ <WH2142> remember נָ֞א <WH4994> now אֵ֣ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> how הִתְהַלַּ֣כְתִּי <WH1980> now how I have walked לְפָנֶ֗יךָ <WH6440> before בֶּֽאֱמֶת֙ <WH571> thee in truth וּבְלֵבָ֣ב <WH3824> heart שָׁלֵ֔ם <WH8003> and with a perfect וְהַטּ֥וֹב <WH2896> [that which is] good בְּעֵינֶ֖יךָ <WH5869> in thy sight עָשִׂ֑יתִי <WH6213> and have done וַיֵּ֥בְךְּ <WH1058> wept חִזְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH2396> And Hezekiah בְּכִ֥י <WH1058> wept גָדֽוֹל׃ <WH1419> sore ס

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> came יְשַׁעְיָ֔הוּ <WH3470> And it came to pass afore Isaiah לֹ֣א <WH3808> Before יָצָ֔א <WH3318> was gone out [הָעִיר כ] (חָצֵ֖ר <WH5892> Ai ק) הַתִּֽיכֹנָ֑ה <WH8484> into the middle וּדְבַר־ <WH1697> that the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> came אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> to him לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came to him saying

שׁ֣וּב <WH7725> Turn again וְאָמַרְתָּ֞ <WH559> and tell אֶל־ <WH413> to חִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <WH2396> Hezekiah נְגִיד־ <WH5057> the captain עַמִּ֗י <WH5971> of my people כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵי֙ <WH430> the God דָּוִ֣ד <WH1732> of David אָבִ֔יךָ <WH1> thy father שָׁמַ֙עְתִּי֙ <WH8085> I have heard אֶת־ <WH853> תְּפִלָּתֶ֔ךָ <WH8605> thy prayer רָאִ֖יתִי <WH7200> I have seen אֶת־ <WH853> דִּמְעָתֶ֑ךָ <WH1832> thy tears הִנְנִי֙ <WH2005> behold רֹ֣פֶא <WH7495> behold I will heal לָ֔ךְ בַּיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <WH7992> thee on the third תַּעֲלֶ֖ה <WH5927> thou shalt go up בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> unto the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְהֹסַפְתִּ֣י <WH3254> And I will add עַל־ <WH5921> unto יָמֶ֗יךָ <WH3117> unto thy days חֲמֵ֤שׁ <WH2568> fif עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <WH6240> teen שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years וּמִכַּ֤ף <WH3709> out of the hand מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> of the king אַשּׁוּר֙ <WH804> of Assyria אַצִּ֣ילְךָ֔ <WH5337> and I will deliver וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> thee and this city הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> and I וְגַנּוֹתִי֙ <WH1598> and I will defend עַל־ <WH5921> and הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> this city הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> my own לְמַֽעֲנִ֔י <WH4616> sake וּלְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> sake דָּוִ֥ד <WH1732> David's עַבְדִּֽי׃ <WH5650> for mine own sake and for my servant

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יְשַֽׁעְיָ֔הוּ <WH3470> And Isaiah קְח֖וּ <WH3947> Take דְּבֶ֣לֶת <WH1690> a lump תְּאֵנִ֑ים <WH8384> of figs וַיִּקְח֛וּ <WH3947> And they took וַיָּשִׂ֥ימוּ <WH7760> and laid עַֽל־ <WH5921> on הַשְּׁחִ֖ין <WH7822> [it] on the boil וַיֶּֽחִי׃ <WH2421> and he recovered

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יְשַׁעְיָ֗הוּ <WH3470> And Isaiah זֶה־ <WH2088> This לְּךָ֤ הָאוֹת֙ <WH226> This sign מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> shalt thou have of the LORD כִּ֚י <WH3588> for יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> will do יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> that the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> the thing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he דִּבֵּ֑ר <WH1696> that he hath spoken הָלַ֤ךְ <WH1980> go forward הַצֵּל֙ <WH6738> shall the shadow עֶ֣שֶׂר <WH6235> ten מַֽעֲל֔וֹת <WH4609> degrees אִם־ <WH518> or יָשׁ֖וּב <WH7725> or go back עֶ֥שֶׂר <WH6235> ten מַעֲלֽוֹת׃ <WH4609> steps
